text: Ariana Grande will be the first person named as an honorary citizen of Manchester following the singer ’ s “ great many selfless acts and demonstrations of community spirit ” in the aftermath of the city ’ s May 22nd terror attack. “ This seems a fitting moment to update the way we recognize those who make noteworthy contributions to the life and success of our city, ” Manchester city council leader Sir Richard Leese said ( via BBC News ). “ We ’ ve all had cause to be incredibly proud of Manchester and the resilient and compassionate way in which the city, and all those associated with it, have responded to the terrible events of 22 May, with love and courage rather than hatred and fear, ” he added. “ Ariana Grande exemplified this response.
